MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH17 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:24pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30pm on 4th January 2021.
